"For nine years, I've been facing the wall.
What's his intention?" The master said.
Let's make this a model for everyone in the world.'
The teacher then had a verse.

source_sentence: 祖師面壁九年餘　　此是西來未上機　直至如今天下客　　強將言句為施為牧童頌二首　濛濛烟雨草春肥　　牧去隨時忘却歸　閑插野草了角上　　不能相悉謂狂機又　牧童自有牧童親　　豈與常流作並鄰　一笛吹從林下過　　逍遙誰愛入紅塵天聖廣燈錄卷第二十九
translation: "The patriarch faced the wall for nine years. This was the first time in the west that he hadn't yet risen to the opportune stage, and now he's a guest in the whole world. He forcibly dedicates the words to the herd boy and gives him two verses: 'The grass is fat in spring from the misty rain, and he forgets to return at any time when he's herding.' 'He sticks his head in the weeds and reaches the horns.' 'He can't be fully understood, but he's called crazy about the opportune stage.' 'The herd boy has his own herd boy relatives, so how could he be the neighbor of the regular stream?' 'A flute blows through the forest below, and he's free to enter the red dust.'
